member.name: M:CedricMao.Tools.ThreadingTask.BackgroundTask.OnRunWorkerCompleted(System.ComponentModel.RunWorkerCompletedEventArgs)
member.summary: An OverLayer of the Backgroundworker that override OnRunWorkerCompleted Not only one Event is raised when the worker completed, but three can be. BgTaskCompleted occurs only if the processing went ok BgTaskError occurs if an exception is raised BgTaskCancelled occurs if the task is cancelled during the processing
